EmailTemplate.name: 12-08-22 HOS McDonalds Ithaca Printer EOL Update.HOS McDonalds Ithaca Printer EO
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Ithaca 9000P Printer Order Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear OTP/Owner Operator, You are receiving this message because you have a pending order for 1 or more Ithaca 9000P printers. The Ithaca 9000P printer is end of life. However, NCR will be fulfilling your current order with the new Ithaca 9000U printer which is a USB printer. The cost is $49 more than the P printer. If you have any questions regarding this, please contact mcdonalds.orders@ncr.com. Sorry for the inconvenience. The NCR McDonald’s Team <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
